title: Arbil- ArchPriest
body:
Support mage

HP 500 +60 3.5/5 sec +0.7
MP 410 +53 4.1/5 sec +0.4
AD 48 +2.22
Atk Speed 0.77 +0.009
Armor 25 +2
MR 18 +3
Speed 340

Passive: Purification
Aura, nearby allies take 3/4/5/6% reduced damage and gains a .4 second invulnerability shield if taken mroe than 60/55/50/45% max HP damage in 1.25 seconds.

Q: Sparkle 40/45/50/55/60MP activation 6/7/8/9/10mp per sec.
Channels while summoning a small orb of lightning. Lightning moves at 325/350/375/400/425 speed. Deals 10/13/16/19/22%AP +20/32/50/74/104 Magic damage to enemies it pass through, each enemy can only be hit once every 3 seconds. Orb is 100 in radius. 
Enemies are also blinded by the light for .5 seconds.

W: Cleanse 200/195/190/185/180 MP 4 second cooldown
Global Effect, Channels for 3.25/3/2.75/2.5/2.25 seconds before cleaning all debuffs from an ally. Healing them for the damage taken in the last 2.5 seconds and granting them a shield for 10% Max HP for 3 seconds.
He can see how much they will heal for above them if he casts the spell.

E: Life Transfer/ Life Drain  Cost in description.
On Ally: Slowly transfers life to a dying ally. Arbil Loses 3% MAX HP and MP per second to give 5/6/7/8/9%AP  +4% Max HP to the ally every second. +14/20/26/32/38. Lasts 7 seconds.
If ally is below 15% health, this ability heals them for 100% more health.
Life Drain (Only can be used while giving health to an ally.)
When transferring health, Arbil may link the opposite chain to an enemy, which will drain life off the enemy to heal Arbil while Arbil heals his ally.
Deals 2% MAX HP +10/12/14/16/18% AP +13/17/21/25/29 Magic Damage every second and heals Arbil for the amount. 
If the enemy is below 25% health, this deals 50% more damage and Heals Arbil for 50% more.

If only using on ally, this is not a channel, but if an ally and an enemy are linked, it then becomes a channel.
Life drain will lose effect if the enemy travels outside 1000 range, for ally it will lose effect when they travel outside 1000 range, if ally travels out first, the enemy will stop being drained but stunned for .25 seconds and have positive buffs removed for .25 seconds.


R: Seal away. Cost 15% MAX HP and MP 60/50/40 second cd.
Passive: Once every 50 seconds, he will gain magic field. In this field of 350 radius, he will regenerate 20/50/80 MP every second and gain 5/10/15% CDR. Allies enter the field also gains the effect. Field lasts 5 seconds

Seal Away: Using his own life and Mana, Arbil summons ethereal chains to entangle his opponent. The chains heavily seal away their power for 3/5/7 seconds. They become unable to heal, or be healed in any way. They are silenced for the first 1.5/2.5/3.5 seconds. They lose 10/15/20% AD and AP. They take 10/15/20% more damage, They also move and attack 10/20/30% slower. 
If he has less than 15% MAX HP, he may still cast this but he will then die, it counts as being killed by the enemy he casts it on.
HOWEVER, if the enemy is killed within 1 second of him dying, he will revive with 1 HP and no MP 500 units away, closest to base from where he cast the spell.
